attributes.action: UK Sovereignty and the NATO Treaty
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned; recognising that:
1) The 1949 Treaty was created as a consequence of the perceived threat from the then Warsaw Pact, which has now lapsed.
2) That the concept of national sovereignty has been extant within England for more than a millenium.
3) That only one overseas signatory nation state has had troops, military paraphenalia, etc. situated on UK soil.

politely request that Her Majesty's Government immediately and politely instruct the government of the United States of America to remove all of its military forces, military equipment, etc. from U.K. soil.
